title: MNF Recap & Team of ATL Nominations
itunes:title: MNF Recap & Team of ATL Nominations
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – recap the Monday Night Football double header, including the Steelers defeating the Redskins and the 49ers shutting out the Rams. Then the heroes break down the latest NFL news including Robert Griffin III being placed on injured reserve and the Saints cutting ties with running back C.J. Spiller. Finally, the guys preview the Thursday Night Football matchup between the Jets and Bills before sharing their nominees for the “Team of ATL.”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
